comment: Do a fix already that you application time to time lags and crushes when I open it/start typing something/tap a sign 鈥渃hange languge鈥?and all other actions! This bug is take place more that ONE YEAR! The same error on 3 android devices Galaxy Note 10 plus, Tab s6, galaxy s9. Android of the 9th version. I have the latest version of ur program. This bug has taken place in each version within all releases of last year.
scenarios: The application lags and crashes when the user opens it.
The application lags and crashes when the user starts typing something.
The application lags and crashes when the user taps the "change language" button.
key sentence: The application lags and crashes when the user taps the "change language" button.
the function of activity: The activity facilitates user interactions: search contacts, access menus, translate text, download offline files, cancel actions, and confirm decisions.
the sub-task list of state: [{'name': 'Search', 'description': 'Search for a language'}, {'name': 'Download Offline Translation File', 'description': 'Download offline translation file for a specific language'}, {'name': 'Select Language', 'description': 'Choose a language for translation'}]

operations.event:
click
